item.title: VIM
item.description: VIM Basic Vim Cheat Sheet - English VimGenius vimgifs Some useful skills Insert across multi-lines Select the lines you want to modify using Ctrl-v. Press: I: Insert before what’s selected. A: Append after what’s selected. c: Replace what’s selected. Type the new text. Press Esc to apply the changes to all selected lines. Search and replace :s/foo/bar/g Change each ‘foo’ to ‘bar’ in the current line. :%s/foo/bar/g Change each ‘foo’ to ‘bar’ in all the lines.
